greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of trailing 2-digits in ternary representation of A048673(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
mathematica: If[First@ # == 2, Length@ #, 0] &@ Last@ Split@ IntegerDigits[#, 3] & /@ Table[(Times @@ Power[If[# == 1, 1, NextPrime@ #] & /@ First@ #, Last@ #] + 1)/2 &@ Transpose@ FactorInteger@ n, {n, 120}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Sep 12 2017 *)
xref: Cf. A007814, A007949, A048673, A291759, A292251 (even bisection subtracted by one).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 12 2017
